entities.name: grimmauld place
entities.description: The location where the conversation is taking place.

entities.name: dora
entities.description: Dora agrees with Lupin that Harry should be godfather.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is hurrying to fetch wine.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is persuading Lupin to join them for a drink.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is beaming around at them all and looks years younger than Harry has ever seen him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry feels overwhelmed, astonished, delighted; he stammers when asked to be godfather.

relationships.description: Dora agrees with Lupin that Harry should be godfather.
Bill is hurrying to fetch wine.
Fleur is persuading Lupin to join them for a drink.
Harry is being asked to be godfather.
Lupin looks years younger than Harry has ever seen him.
